name: FileMaker Pro Runtime Extension
summary: Learn about .BLU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BLU extensions are beneficial when you need to enhance your FileMaker Pro databases with additional capabilities not included in the standard software package. By importing a BLU file, you can tailor your database applications to suit your specific needs better, whether for business processes, data management, or other specialized tasks.

description: A BLU file is a runtime extension created by blue.project for use by FileMaker Pro, a database management system. It extends the functionality of FileMaker Pro, allowing users to add custom features or tools to their databases.
